translations: 开除，解雇；不考虑，不理会；驳回，停止受理；让……离开，解散；（板球）使退场，使出局

sentences.sentence: He was so irresponsible that I decided to dismiss him.
sentences.translation: 他如此不负责任，我决定解雇他。

sentences.sentence: I think we can safely dismiss their objections.
sentences.translation: 我认为我们对他们的异议完全可以不予理会。

sentences.sentence: They were quick to dismiss rumours of an off-screen romance.
sentences.translation: 两人迅速否认了他们在现实生活中是情侣的传言。
